mean_en: the quality of doing something well with no waste of time or money; ways of wasting less time and money or of saving time or money
sentence: He believes writing with three pens together can improve efficiency.
sentence_trans: 他认为用三支笔一起写可以提高效率。
word_etyma: ef出 + fic做 + iency表名词 → 做出事情 → efficiency有效率
